entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
